CustomField.description: This picklist allows special settings for the Tele-EC Scheduled pause functionality for VISN Case Escalation. Leave blank if you wish to use default settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This picklist allows special settings for the Tele-EC Scheduled pause functionality for VISN Case Escalation. Leave blank if you wish to use default settings.
CustomField.label: Tele-EC Schedule Settings
